TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceNameElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Docs.summary: The ServiceNameElement class represents a configuration element for a service name used in a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> property is set to `null`.
The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> property should be set to an appropriate value for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> instance to the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> class.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Service Provider Name (SPN) for this instance.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> that contains the representation of SPN for this instance.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.String> that contains the representation of SPN for this instance.
